All malaria modules developed for the **XH** component must define four functions to compute malaria prevalence (traditionally called the parasite rate). Several species of malaria parasites infect humans, so we must be more specific and define *Plasmodium falciparum* Parasite Rate or *Pf*PR. 

+ *true* - the true *Pf*PR

+ *lm* - the *Pf*PR by light microscopy 

+ *rdt* - the PR by rapid diagnostic test 

+ *pcr* - the PR by PCR
